title: looking for Silver+ to join ranked 5s team
body:
Looking for silver+ to join our ranked team

Me and my housemate are currently in it he is versatile across all lanes and im a bot lane main.

Must have teamspeak and be able to play most nights of the week.
we dont care where we end up but no flamers or trolls we just want to have a good time.
post up your stats and pref roles and we will tkae it from there.

Cheers!

replies.body:
Heyas,

I'm a mid laner main, here are my infos. Availabel every night.

My info :
Ingame Name : Katalize

Current Rank: G3
Highest Rank Achieved: G1

Top 5 Mid Champs:
Currently playing a lot : Brand / Veigar / Kayle / Cassio / Velkoz
Highly skilled on : Elise / Fizz / TF / katarina / LB / Zed

What do you want from a team:
I value team spirit, working on our mutual flaws together.
I expect my team members to be open to criticism as much as I am.
I am not a leader type, yet I expect to be able to give advice and strategic opinions, while being heard out.
I am looking to learn from other experienced and motivated players.

Rank 5s Experience:
I have played in a 5 teams in season 3, Australian player base on NA server. I was the mid laner and our compositions relied on CC / AOE such as Galio / Cho gath / Kennen / Vlad mid picks.
I haven't played in 5's ranked since then, mainly in 3s on Twisted treeline and solo/ duo queue on SR.

Hey,
I'm silver 5/4 Adc Main
My main champs are Jinx Vayne and trist i am willing to learn other champs if needed
i do well at other roles but not so much as support\
i am online about every hour of the day unless im going out or doing something
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Hi guys I pref adc or supp but can also jung pretty well, i was S4 in EUWest server but moving here i've been demoted to B3, I'm a chill guy who don't like ragers and love team play. My IGN is LegionXI
Hello, my IGN is Da3littlepigs and I am a support main. I can play all roles, but I prefer Support, then Top and struggle in the jungle. I also love shotcalling and developing with my team.

S3 player keen
JG/Sup mains 

Casual but keen type of player!

Hallo friendly Silver 2 player would like to join your team. I main Top, absolutely horrendous at adc and am OK at all the other roles.
Im active almost every single day and can play for many hours usually.
Would love to join :)
ill add you and give you an invite
